review: Was there very recently for dental clean up. Very satisfied with the patient care and treatment received at Dr. S. Shah's clinic. Liked all-smile, friendly atmosphere at the clinic. Having visited dentists in Germany and Norway quite a few times, I can say that Dr. Shah is practically very experienced and is in extremely good touch with the dental clinical procedures. Was quite happy with the soft, observant and confident handling of my case by Dr. Shah. I very much recommend a visit to Dr. Shah.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Sanyukta put my 7 year old son at ease within the first minute, explained the whole procedure and answered all his questions patiently.
My son was totally comfortable in all the sittings and he is so impressed with Dr Sanyukta he aspires to become a dentist like her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Thanks Dr. Sanyukta!!

I visited there for Dental Treatment, m feeling absolutely perfect now.

I really appreciate the way u are working, you are very expert.

It was very easy to get an appointment.
Easy to get in touch with doctor.
Doctor was available on Scheduled time.

It was a nice meeting.

I strongly recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was the best experience I have Come across during the course of treatment of root canal.
Flexibility of timing as per my convenience was one of the best thing for me.
Proper explanation of treatment process and friendly atmosphere of clinic keeps me very comfortable during the course of treatment.

I'll always suggest to my family and friends for dental issues.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had a terrible experience with the doctor *** ****** *** **** ******* *** **** ********** Most importantly hygiene at clinic and sterility of equipment used are below par. She didn’t have an assistant on the day of procedure and did everything alone. She did not explain the brand and type of bone graft and membrane put inside after tooth extraction. * ********* ** **** *********** **** *** ******** ** *** *** * **** ***** ******* *** *** ******* **** ** *** * ******* **** ********* I finally consulted a ****** *** **** *********** doctor *** ******** **** ********** ********* *** *** ******* ***** ** ******* *** **** ***** *** ********* I would not not recommend her for any procedure ****** ****** ***** ********

*** ******** **** ** * ***** ****** *** listens to the patient and takes care of him/her with great attention. She is a confident professional and makes you understand what you should do with your teeth to avoid any oral health issues. *** *** ***** **** ********** *** ***** * ** **** ********* She is also very patient while explaining the course of treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor ** ********* ************* *** takes very good care during the procedure. She only does what is necessary and doesn't charge people more than what is required, unlike most other doctors. Her treatment has yielded good results for me and I would definitely recommend her to everyone.

This was my first visit to a dentist, I was in lot of pain due to the cavity and also afraid of the dentist but, Dr. Sanyukta Shah made the procedure a lot easier and completed the procedure with minimum pain. She is a great doctor and a great person, makes you feel very comfortable during the procedure. I would surely recommend her to all my friends and family.

review: I would recommend her to anyone who is seeking a dentist. She is confident, makes you feel comfortable, and takes time to explain things.

review: She is overall good. Done the scaling and polishing properly and explained how to brush properly and recommended some medicines.

It's sad  that we had to wait for more than an hour after our schedule appointment. In today's busy life, who has that much time to just wait for 2 hrs post the appointment time. She doesn't value our time and quite insensitive towards this...
Unexpected behaviour

I visited 5/6 times for my teeth treatment.              Everytime Dr.behaviour was very friendly and very smooth treatment without any pain and no any trouble.  Finally,my treatment was successful and today I have no any problem . Thanks to Dr. Sanyukta  shah .
reply_text: Thank you very much for your feedback 😊

review: She was brilliant. Very soft while injecting. I have always been very scared of dentist but she is someone you can trust blindly. Genuine consultation. My treatment is still on however I am sure , I will treated rightly.
Very nice doctor I haven't realise that my treatment is going on. I never pain in my entire session . Also staff is also very helpful.

One of the finest doctor in my area..************ *** ** ***** ********* ** *** *********.. Her skills..with air roater..is really good. I give her a 5 star rating...and would recommend her to everyone☺☺☺
It is nice and fully meets my expections. I came for a check up of my gum condition for a suitable denture. The doctor recommended the perfect one.
Am very happy with the whole process, more imp, the way I was handled n taken care of. I have already recommended the doctor in my office

It's was an amazing painless experience. Dr. Shah was very patient, friendly, and professional throughout the course of the treatment. She helped me understand the situation and choose the best option. Thank you!
Was a good experience at the clinic.. I am usually petrified at the thought of visiting a dentist.  Dr Sanjukta is friendly and ensures to make the procedure as painless as possible.. thank you.
The doctor treat the patient is very friendly.it good to be make treatment with doctor.I like to send my friend to here.

Doctor has good understanding and handles tooth issues with care. Fees are also within budget.
Good experience.
She was really warm and welcoming. Entire treatment was as seamless as possible. Never felt any pain.

Dr. Sanyugta, is an excellent Endodontist,  she is very caring and very good in her skill. My inplant surgery went very smoothly and recovery was fast. I am from USA and I can say with confidence the clinic meets the highest hygienic standards which is very important for a dental surgery,  I would recommend her to anyone.
The doctor is good but a bit expensive. For instance her rate for root canal is rs. 3000 plus cap rs. 1200 whereas nearby dentist charge rs. 1800 incl cap.
